SELECT sm.station_manager_id, sm.employee_id, sm.start_date, sm.end_date, sm.station_id, sm.station_manager_status, ps.community_name, ps.city, ps.address, ps.shelves_total_number, e.full_name, e.employee_code, e.phone_number, e.avatar, e.work_city, r.role_type, phc.company_name, phc.company_type, a.account_id, a.username, a.email, a.password, a.status FROM t_31_station_manager AS sm RIGHT JOIN t_72_company_employee AS e ON sm.employee_id = e.employee_id LEFT JOIN t_81_role_type AS r ON e.role_id = r.role_id LEFT JOIN t_32_parcel_station AS ps ON sm.station_id = ps.station_id LEFT JOIN t_71_parcel_hub_company AS phc ON e.company_id = phc.company_id LEFT JOIN t_11_registered_account AS a ON e.account_id = a.account_id
AND sm.station_manager_id = #{stationManagerId}
